name: fa-gallery-downloader-dx
description: Dead simple gallery download for FurAffinity
author: neon@alphaneon.blue

scripts.build-linux: npm ci && npx package && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./package.json').version;fs.renameSync('../FA-Gallery-Downloader-DX.tar.gz','./fa-gallery-downloader-dx-v'+v+'.tar.gz')"
scripts.build-windows: npm ci && npx package && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const v=require('./package.json').version;fs.renameSync('../FA-Gallery-Downloader-DX.zip','./fa-gallery-downloader-dx-v'+v+'.zip')"
